FuncDef:
The display rip neighbor last-nbr-down command displays information about the last neighbors that went Down in a RIP process.
The display ripng neighbor last-nbr-down command displays information about the last neighbors that went Down in a RIPng process. The display rip neighbor last-nbr-down command displays information about the last neighbors that went Down in a RIP process. The display ripng neighbor last-nbr-down command displays information about the last neighbors that went Down in a RIPng process.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays neighbors of a specified process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
